channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Police have person of interest in custody over Brown University shooting that killed 2, wounded 9
item.description: Separately, an FBI agent said that the arrest occurred at a Hampton Inn hotel in Coventry, about 20 miles from Providence.

item.title: Deadly Attack in Syria on U.S. Troops Exposes Growing Challenges for Country’s Leader
item.description: The attacks further complicate President Ahmed al-Sharaa’s efforts to unify the country and rebuild relationships with the international community, an...

item.title: U.S. troops have been on the ground in Syria for over a decade. Here’s the back story and present situation after the deadly Islamic State attack
item.description: The number of U.S. troops in the country has fluctuated and currently stands at around 900.

item.title: Atlantic CEO Nick Thompson on how he learned to ‘just keep moving forward’ after his famous firing at 22
item.description: Thompson was fired on his first—and last—day at CBS News' flagship 60 Minutes. Fifteen years later, he heard what Steve Kroft really thought about it.

item.title: Everything the Trump administration is doing in Venezuela involves oil and regime change—even if the White House won’t admit it
item.description: The U.S. is weighing its military options in oil-rich Venezuela, influencing elections in other South American petroleum nations, and increasingly try...

item.title: The first-term congressman leading the GOP’s midterm House campaign says Trump is intimately involved in recruitment decisions
item.description: Trump’s involvement contrasts with 2017, when he was not as tied to House leadership, on details of the midterm campaign as he is now.

item.title: A Hanukkah Attack
item.description: We cover shootings at Bondi Beach, in Australia, and at Brown University.

item.title: The Dark Side of the Global Surrogacy and Fertility Industry
item.description: Eve was one of dozens of Thai women who traveled 4,000 miles — only to be trapped by the dark side of the global fertility industry.

item.title: Live Updates: Police Say Jewish Community Targeted in Sydney Attack That Killed 11
item.description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese called the shooting on Bondi Beach a terrorist attack targeting a Hanukkah celebration. One suspect was killed and ano...

item.title: Leaders worldwide react with horror to the Bondi attack.
item.description: They condemned the antisemitic attack at Bondi Beach and pledged to stand with Jews during a period of rising antisemitism around the world.

item.title: What Is Chabad, the Group That Hosted the Hanukkah Event in Australia?
item.description: The global organization represents a branch of Hasidic Judaism. It is dedicated to strengthening Jewish life through educational, cultural and other s...

item.title: Hamas Confirms Top Commander’s Death in Israeli Strike in Gaza
item.description: The killing of the commander, Raed Saad, on Saturday was the highest-profile assassination of a Hamas leader since a cease-fire came into force two mo...

item.title: Here’s the latest.
item.description: Anyone in the area should take shelter, the police said. They declined to elaborate, and details of the shooting were not immediately clear.

item.title: Home-Schooled Kids Are Not All Right
item.description: Not once, in the four and a half years I learned at home, did anyone from the state come to assess what sort of education I was receiving, or even jus...

item.title: Floods, Mud and Cold Add to Gazans’ Misery
item.description: The rainstorm that battered the enclave this week has left many shivering in tent camps. Despite a cease-fire, rebuilding is still a long way off.
